page.title: 15Medieval Week
page.content: Due to the{Quincentenial {celebrations}(page 14) the people of {Llandovery}held a{Medieval week}in August 1985.Many townspeople dressed in{Medieval costume}throughout the week and attended the many functions.During the week there was a {Horticultural show}and{Medieval Fayre with archery,falconry display,Medieval games and side shows.Those involved walked in costumes from the town square to the show field.{Other events included a fancy-dress children's tea party; beating the bounds of the old borough;a lamb roast with harp playing and folk dancing;a Flower Festival at Llandingat Church and a Mock Medieval Horse Sale.
